CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function deleteConnection is vulnerable to OS command injection. The function uses the execFile method to execute the 'nmcli' command with user-supplied input (ap.ssid) without proper sanitization or validation. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands through the ap.ssid parameter, leading to arbitrary command execution.
